headline: DIAGNOSTIC INSTRUMENTS SMS20
description: Boom Stand    Stands can be fitted for B&L Stereo Zoom Microscopes, Leica Stereozoom Microscopes and Nikon Stereo Zoom Microscopes  Available only with purchase of a Stereozoom Microscope   E-arm not included
